architectural_pivot.decision: Pivoted from multi-market to single-market training for simplicity and effectiveness
architectural_pivot.reasoning: Single-market environments (max_markets=1) provide cleaner training while maintaining market-agnostic feature extraction

implementation_highlights.market_agnostic_design: Universal feature extraction works identically across all Kalshi markets
implementation_highlights.probability_space_normalization: All price-based features normalized to [0,1] probability space
implementation_highlights.temporal_analysis: Advanced time gap detection, burst analysis, and activity momentum tracking
implementation_highlights.portfolio_integration: Comprehensive position and P&L encoding for decision context
implementation_highlights.single_market_simplicity: Clean single-market episodes enable focused strategy learning

test_validation.consistency_verified: Market-agnostic features validated across different market types

api_alignment_fix.description: Fixed portfolio feature extraction to use actual market prices instead of hardcoded 50 cents

api_alignment_fix.impact: Accurate position valuation for both training (simulated) and deployment (real API data)
api_alignment_fix.validation: New test validates position value calculations vary correctly with market prices

kalshi_limit_order_discovery.critical_finding: Kalshi only supports limit orders, no market orders
kalshi_limit_order_discovery.impact: Original 5-action stateless design incompatible with Kalshi's trading constraints
kalshi_limit_order_discovery.required_action: Update action space to handle limit order pricing and order state management

architectural_constraints.market_agnostic: Model never sees market tickers or market-specific metadata
architectural_constraints.session_based: Episodes generated from session_id data with guaranteed continuity
architectural_constraints.unified_metrics: Same position tracking for training and inference matching Kalshi API
architectural_constraints.primitive_actions: Simple action space allows agent to discover complex strategies

milestones.goal: Update action space to work with Kalshi's limit-only order system
milestones.critical_discovery_context: Kalshi only supports limit orders (no market orders), requiring significant action space redesign

design_decisions.action_count: 7 actions: HOLD, PLACE_BUY_YES_LIMIT, PLACE_SELL_YES_LIMIT, PLACE_BUY_NO_LIMIT, PLACE_SELL_NO_LIMIT, CANCEL_ALL, ADJUST_AGGRESSIVE
design_decisions.order_management: One order per market rule (simplifies state management)
design_decisions.contract_sizing: Fixed 10 contract sizing (maintained from original M6 design)
design_decisions.pricing_strategy: Orders use actual limit prices based on bid/ask, not market type
design_decisions.state_tracking: Add order tracking features to observation space

steps.instruction: Update action_space.py to handle limit order pricing using bid/ask based calculations

Update observation space to include order status features (pending orders, order ages, etc.)
Implement cancel/amend order logic for CANCEL_ALL and ADJUST_AGGRESSIVE actions
Add integration with user-fills WebSocket for fill tracking and position updates
Update tests for limit order behavior and order state management

acceptance_criteria: Actions generate valid Kalshi limit orders with proper pricing

Observation includes order awareness features
Can cancel and amend existing orders
Works with Kalshi's limit-only constraint
Maintains fixed 10-contract sizing for simplicity

Use spaces.Discrete(5) for single-market action space (NOT MultiDiscrete)
Implement action validation for single market state (check liquidity, position limits)
Add documentation explaining stateless design and single-market strategy discovery
Write tests for 5-action decoding and stateless operation

acceptance_criteria: 5 discrete actions for single market (HOLD + 4 NOW, NO WAIT actions)

spaces.Discrete(5) not MultiDiscrete (single market at a time)
Action decoding produces valid Kalshi order format for one market
Truly stateless - no pending orders to track
Compatible with single-market observation space from M4

key_technical_decisions.delete_first_strategy: Prevents temptation to reference broken legacy code and forces fresh thinking
key_technical_decisions.session_based_episodes: Leverages session_ids for guaranteed data continuity and simplified multi-market coordination
key_technical_decisions.market_agnostic_features: Universal feature extraction works identically across all Kalshi markets
key_technical_decisions.primitive_actions: Simple actions enable agent to discover complex strategies like arbitrage through learning
key_technical_decisions.unified_metrics: Single position tracking system for both training and inference matching Kalshi API
key_technical_decisions.simplified_rewards: Reward equals portfolio value change only - captures all important signals naturally
